p: Statistical analysis results were analysed values by GraphPad Prism version 6.0 software. For Student t test and ANOVA, p < 0.05 was considered statistically significant. Values were expressed as means ± SEM. Significance was determined by χ 2 test, others were determined by Student’s t-test. A value of p < 0.05 was used as the criterion for statistical significance. ***indicates significant difference with p < 0.001, **indicates p < 0.01, *indicates p < 0.05.
